title: Help! 4 Win IP Boost MIA!
body: I confirmed my email address before deciding my summoner name in game, now my 4 Win IP Boost is missing because of it >_<. Jeez I'm a clumsy fella XD...

replies.body: No worries buddy! I've double-checked and the 4 win boost is now on your account. It looks like you've still got another win left too!

Is it a display issue or why does it still say 1 win left >_<? I bought a 4 win ip boost, another 4 from starter bundle, and played 7 games yesterday. Shouldn't I be left with 5 if the free one arrived today?
Aha! I had not noticed that you also bought the starter bundle. I've gone back in and made sure you've got all the remaining boosts you should have at this point ^_^!
